discussion.p: All the defaulted operator==s in are currently specified as:

blockquote.pre: friend constexpr bool operator==(strong_ordering v, strong_ordering w) noexcept = default;

discussion.p: But the rule for defaulting operator== requires that the arguments be const&. All five should all look like:

blockquote.pre: friend constexpr bool operator==(const strong_ordering& v, const strong_ordering& w) noexcept = default;

discussion.note: 2019-11 Wednesday night issue processing - status to Open
discussion.p: Our preference is for CWG to fix this. JW to provide wording in case CWG cannot.
discussion.note: Resolved by the adoption of P1946R0 in Belfast
